meaningMnemonic: The <radical>soul</radical> of a <radical>narwhal</radical> was sucked into its <radical>towel</radical>, which is <kanji>scary</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: As you watch this <kanji>scary</kanji> scene you can't help but mutter, "<reading>Foo</reading>l," (ふ) under your breath. Then you hear "Fool, fool, fool, it's too scary you fool!" and you realize all of the other narwhals are chanting.
